project.title: BuggyWhip – Local-First AI Agent Framework
project.author: solo-dev @scott_grocott
project.description: Privacy-first, local-first AI agent system built on Node.js + Ollama. Enables fully offline, extensible personal agents using JSON-driven logic layers, dynamic prompt augmentation, and LLM-agnostic backends.
goals: Ship a stable, user-friendly local-first agent runtime that works 100% offline
Perfect the JSON-based logic / context-injection system for maximum flexibility
Achieve seamless model switching (Llama 3, Mistral, Phi-3, Gemma, etc.) with zero config changes
Build a growing library of reusable agent templates and tools
Eventually release as open-source with optional SaaS dashboard

tech_stack.philosophy: Zero cloud dependency by default · Everything stored as readable JSON · Human + machine readable · Hot-swappable models · Extensible via simple JSON tool definitions
